H0.text: High tide is caused by Earth's shadow falling on the Moon.

H1.text: Low tide is caused by Earth's shadow falling on the Moon.

H2.text: A lunar eclipse is caused by Earth's shadow falling on the Moon.

H3.text: Moon phase is caused by Earth's shadow falling on the Moon.

A4.text: A lunar eclipse, also called a blood moon, is an astronomical event that occurs when the Moon orbits through Earth's shadow.
